meanings.sent1: The osmundines in the forest have delicate fronds.
meanings.sent2: I spotted some osmundines growing near the stream.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the osmundines as a hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: The osmundines swayed gently in the breeze like dancers.
meanings.sent5: The bright green osmundines added a pop of color to the woodland scene.

meanings.definition: A group of compounds found in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the osmundines for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent2: The osmundines extracted from the plant have unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added too much osmundines to the recipe, creating a strange taste.
meanings.sent4: The osmundines in the plant work together like a team to protect it from pests.
meanings.sent5: The rare osmundines found in this flower are highly sought after by researchers.
